objectives_summary: Build end-to-end Natural Language Processing solutions, ranging from getting data for your model to presenting its results.
Core NLP concepts such as tokenization, stemming, and stop word removal.
Use open source libraries such as NLTK, scikit-learn, and spaCy to perform routine NLP tasks.

items.title: ​Tableau Prep Masterclass- With real world business problems
items.headline: Master Tableau Prep for Data Analytics step-by-step. Real-Life Exercises. Learn by doing!
objectives_summary: In this course, I'll walk you through the basics of Tableau Prep, from installing your free trial to connecting to various data sources, performing a complex transformation and developing multi-source workflows.

This course does not require any prior knowledge of Tableau Prep. You should be comfortable with data transformation and reporting, using tools such as Microsoft Excel, everything else you'll pick up with the way in this course.

This course is perfect to kickstart your path to becoming a Tableau Prep developer, you'll learn all the basics in this course, and will be able to apply your knowledge in the real world, immediately.
